AssessmentQuestionAssignment.name: AssessmentQuestionAssignment
AssessmentQuestionAssignment.description: Represents a junction between an assessment question set and an assessment question.

AssessmentQuestionId.description: Required. The ID of the assessment question associated with this record.

AssessmentQuestionSetId.description: Required. The ID of the assessment question set associated with this record.

LastReferencedDate.description: The timestamp for when the current user last viewed a record related to this record.

LastViewedDate.description: The timestamp for when the current user last viewed this record. If this value is null, itâ€™s possible that this record was referenced (LastReferencedDate) and not viewed.

Name.description: Required. The name of the record.

OwnerId.description: The ID of the user who created the relationship record.

SequenceNumber.description: The sequence number for an assessment question in an assessment question set.
